question: When a dog smells food and begins drooling, it is responding to an external stimulus. Which of these describes a response to an internal stimulus?
candidate_answers: (A) A cat sees a mouse and crouches. (B) A parrot hears a name and repeats it. (C) A person eats spoiled food and vomits. (D) A worm senses water and moves to the surface.
answer: A cat sees a mouse and crouches.
label: A
